description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the scripting engine handles objects in memory in Microsoft Edge (HTML-based), aka 'Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1426, CVE-2019-1428, CVE-2019-1429.

product.name: Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows 10 Version 1903 for 32-bit Systems
Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows 10 Version 1903 for x64-based Systems

Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows 10 Version 1903 for ARM64-based Systems
